translations: 水煮；去壳水煮蛋；非法猎取；挖走（人员等）；窃取；把……踏成泥浆（poach 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Many national parks set up to provide a refuge for wildlife are regularly invaded by people poaching game.
sentences.translation: 很多旨在为野生动物提供庇护的国家公园经常受到偷猎者的入侵。

sentences.sentence: But even if the poaching of carnivorous plants can be halted, they will continue to suffer from other assaults.
sentences.translation: 但是，即使能够停止对食肉植物的偷猎，它们仍将遭受其它的攻击。

sentences.sentence: To satisfy his thirst for poaching, tour operators and safari hunters were alerted to report finding any poaching incident.
sentences.translation: 为了满足他对偷猎的渴望，旅游运营商和狩猎猎人被提醒要报告发现任何偷猎事件。
